company_info.name: Tata Steel Limited
company_info.business_summary: Tata Steel Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of steel products in India and internationally. It offers reinforcement bars (rebars) and wire rods, cut-and-bend reinforcement bars, welded wire mesh, prefabricated cages (pre-cages), steel couplers and carpet reinforcement, hot-rolled, cold rolled, coated coil, tubes, rebar, metallic coated, pre-finished steels, alloy steels, and profiles and construction systems. The company also provides solutions in building envelope, structural, fit-out, foundations, and highway engineering products, as well as operates steel service centers. It serves original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) in the automotive and construction sectors; project customers; micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs); individual retail consumers; government organizations; public sector undertakings; and Individual housebuilders. The company was incorporated in 1907 and is based in Mumbai, India.
